website_summaries.verdict: A medium-firm memory foam mattress that keeps the spine aligned and sleeps cool.
pros: Great for heavier seniors, this thick mattress provides a supportive base layer
Medium-firm rating is good for back sleepers
cons: Indentation and sagging can be noticeable after about a year of use

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Truly an amazing bed, and it's high quality. This photo is within seconds of opening it. It reached the full 12 inches in about 4 hours and there was no odor! The box had a few blemishes when it arrived, but nothing near what other reviews described. I have honestly never slept better than I have on this bed. I wake up with no aches or pains and it's hard to stay awake once I lay on it. I love it and find myself counting down until I can go to sleep just because it's so comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: this was great for the 1st 8 or 9 months
customer_reviews.text: This is the most uncomfortable thing I have ever slept on
customer_reviews.author: mark donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, sleeps at a perfect temperature
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this mattress so far! Headed for just about two months, and I’ve been sleeping soundly. If I had to give a complaint, like most memory foam mattresses it is kind of soft around the edges. Other than that, great mattress, although my packaging arrived in absolute disarray. That does not take anything away from how good this mattresses though.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$$$.  Crap mattress!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst mattress ever! Would have given -500 stars if I could. So I have waited a couple months to write my review. I wanted to test out the mattress first. Horrible! Two months in and it already has “low” areas where we lay that never go away! Does not hold its shape or firmness at all. The middle of the bed has a permanent hump already! The description says it has a cooling gel, have yet to feel any cooling. Do not buy unless you want to lay on a lumpy mattress that does not keep its shape. Big waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bed is great I have back issues
customer_reviews.text: I am unavle to sleep on any mattress with out pillow under my legs due to bacj pain this ned dramtically changed that i have no pain with this bed Don't let the 1 person out of 1000 that got a bad bed detour you I almost didn't buy it after reading some reviews this bed opened up and expanded to it's full dimensions within minutes, I don't think it gets any warmer than any other traditional mattress, me and my wife both sleep on a California king there is more than enough room it's not like she is leaning into me or anything I am very happy with this buy I would buy it again in a heart beat
customer_reviews.author: Nic calkins

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fit properly in queen size bed-frame
customer_reviews.text: I have a wooden bed-frame. After inflating mattress, I tried to install, but it didn't fit properly. It was sticking out. So I wanted to return it. I called Amazon customer service. Representative called me and said someone will call me. Someone called me to schedule a time, as I could not be home during weekdays, I asked them to pick it up on weekends. Person said okay but never came to pick it up nor called me back again. Did not hear back at all after last conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Rajendra L. Shahi

customer_reviews.title: very firm, lots of pain
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this mattress for barely over a month. I thought I would get used to it. It's extremely firm, and I'm walking up in a lot of pain now. It's getting worse. I'm now out of the return window, even though it says it has a year tryout period...? Also, I'm in perfect health and not overweight. I'm 5'7" and 115lbs.
customer_reviews.author: 11brookey

customer_reviews.title: UGH.... YOU DID IT AGAIN AMAZON 😡
customer_reviews.text: I tried this out for a couple of weeks. So my review is.... it was very comfortable till I noticed this week it is hard as can be. It does get hard after a few weeks. Not a satisfied customer!!! Save your money or buy a better mattress
customer_reviews.author: Wade & Michele

customer_reviews.title: Not quality foam.
customer_reviews.text: This thing literally feels like a bunch of egg crate mattress pads from the 90’s smashed together. Save your money and get something that actually feels like you’re sleeping on a bed. Don’t get me wrong, we’re not new to the memory foam mattresses in a box - we have four others which Is how I know how much of a piece of you know what this one is. Spend a touch more money and you will be infinitely happier (because my children have proven to me that sleep does in fact equal happiness).
customer_reviews.author: Kbates

customer_reviews.title: Mattress was wrapped upside down.
customer_reviews.text: My mattress came configured upside down. The first night I slept on it I put it on the bed with the labeling up. It felt pretty firm. I started feeling the sides and wanted to count the layers like the images show. The thickest layer was on top. I had to flip the mattress over with the labels pointing down just to have the gel layers on top. I guess it doesn't matter too much, but I can't imagine I'm the only person that got theirs wrapped upside down. I don't think I'm up to the challenge of unzipping the thing and fixing it since its so huge.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Worst Mattress Everrrrr
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of garbage. I've only slept on this mattress for about 2 weeks and the mattress never reached the thickness it should be after I bought it I let it stay in the room for 3 days so it can reach the thickness it should be and it's very uncomfortable to sleep on. Also it never regains itself back once your off the bed the imprint just stays. Mygestion is don't buy in my honest opinion .
customer_reviews.author: COCO

customer_reviews.title: You will hurt and not sleep
customer_reviews.text: I’ve slept on this mattress for about 60 days and I’ve never been on more pain. I have horrible pain in my neck on both sides and can barely move it. My arm is completely numb from the pain and my back hurts so bad. I’ve now moved to the floor in hopes of getting some sleep.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Hardest mattress I’ve ever encountered, VERY uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Hard as sleeping on a concrete floor! We’ve had to buy an additional 5 INCHES of padding. 3 inches of memory foam & 2 inches of mattress pad. This is WORST than sleeping on a box spring & I’m NOT kidding. How & why this mattress got anything more than 1 star baffles me. We depend on reviews before buying anything online because we can’t touch/feel the product. Many of the reviews read the mattress is hard but thats a huge understatement. VERY disappointed, if ZERO stars was available I would have chosen it!
customer_reviews.author: Davy W

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't irritate my nerve damage.  Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Squishy and comfortable. No pressure points. You sink in enough to feel like jello but firm enough to be supported. *update 3/19/2020 Still my favorite bed ever. Still has its perfect shape no indents. Only reason id get rid of it is to buy the queen size! I love this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah E.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Meh! The mattress arrived intact with no issues at all. However, after allowing it to sit out for 2 days it never ‘Inflated’ to 12 inches. The middle just kinda sinks. I’m absolutely gutted because I got rid of my old mattress in favor of this one, after reading all the positive reviews. It’s too much hassle to return it, so I was forced to spend another $100 for a quality topper so I could sleep. To add insult to injury, I see it’s on sale for even less than I paid. Win some, learn some. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Not a soft mattress, but I like firm so seems fine after a few nights. Have another brand as well. This mattress is not as high quality as the other, but it was significantly less for the king size. Was trying to save some money and am still very happy with this lower cost one. Expanded to true size, no odor. Cover is a bit loose, saggy looking, but that does not affect sleep quality. I sleep great, no pressure points considering I have a hip problem. I can sleep on both sides with this mattress where I cannot on a traditional pillow top. Got the 12" which is plenty thick.
customer_reviews.author: CBreeze

customer_reviews.title: FIBERGLASS EVERYWHERE DO NOT REMOVED THE MATTRESS COVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: As the title implies, I made the mistake of taking the mattress cover off to wash it thinking it would be okay and I wish I never had. There is fiberglass everywhere and on all of my clothes. Not only do I not have the money to replace the mattress, I also have no means to throw out everything and buy new stuff. No where on the product page does it disclose that they use fiberglass and to not remove the cover if ships with. Please learn from my mistake and always ask to see if they use fiberglass. It'll save you a lot of pain and sanity
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Be aware!
customer_reviews.text: We may send it back tomorrow. Its grate quality, expanded within couple of hours. Just BE AWARE! This matress is hard almost like a concrete floor. Its my first night using it and not happy with how hard it feels. I weight 185lb.
customer_reviews.author: BGWENGG

customer_reviews.title: You're better off sleeping on a cutting board.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT 12". A man must have written the description, because the measurement was vastly exaggerated. Even after over a month, the mattress has only expanded to 10". We continue to wake up with aches and pains. If it wasn't a gigantic hassle to return this, we would.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Laced in fiberglass
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy a mattress in a box again. Not sure how manufacturers are even aloud to sell them. I started having a lot of breathing problems and a sore throat. Finally figured out that my mattress has a fiber glass cover under the washable sheet. Lots of doctor bills later. Thanks to Vibe mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: zach sizemore

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best mattress I have ever purchased. I can't believe how well it has held up over the past year, It is quality that I did not expect for the price. I am a bigger guy and I had expected the memory foam to have indentions or changes, however it has not - it is just as supportive and comfortable as the day I purchased it. I am going to buying a second one for our guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: TH1985

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: I am 245 lbs and 6 foot tall I wake up so sunk into the mattress that some mornings I almost cant get out of the bed. It's a great quality but way too soft. When me and my wife are both in the bed I sink so deep that she rolls into the hole I've created and we wake up so stiff and sore that we spend most of the day in pain.
customer_reviews.author: chkolby33

customer_reviews.title: Not a plush mattress, returning is a hassle
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a plush mattress. Its a very firm mattress. Attempted to return based on inaccurate description and Amazon chat person told me UPS would pick it up even if its not in the box. UPS laughed when they showed up to return it. They had no way to fit it in their truck. After an hour with Amazon chat, a manager told me I could keep or donate the mattress and that I would be refunded. I ended up buying a 3 inch mattress topper for it and we are still using it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: I have just came from the Zinus Green Tea 12" mattress. We actually have three of those and now one of these in our house. This was slightly cheaper and a little different than the Zinus, with all the reviews I went for it. I do say I like the Zinus better if you are like me deciding between the two, my experience the Zinus is more firm which is my preference. Now the Zinus got pretty flat feeling after (4?) years and this mattress is very comfortable. I`m 6`3", 220 and it`s perfectly comfortable, I have three compressed disc and started the memory foam route hoping it would help (it has 100% been better than traditional mattresses)
customer_reviews.author: JustLiftTheWeights

customer_reviews.title: was this mattress used??
customer_reviews.text: The left side of this mattress sags significantly as if this had a previous owner. I weigh 115 pounds and sleep in the middle. Sleeping on the right side is like sleeping on a hill that I'm about to roll down until the foam conforms to my body. Interestingly, there is never any dip on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Emeraldcity

customer_reviews.title: A fair bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: For the price, nice- i had put in so much thought and effort into the purchase of a mattress- i just needed to settle with something... so, this- is/was a fine deal for the $ - however, i find it hot and would prefer something more substantial-heft and weight wise this is for a princess... not a queen
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great mattress at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical about this bed because it's so inexpensive. My first night I did wake up sore the next morning, BUT, I've been sleeping on it almost three months and that was the only time. I love this bed and I'm so pleased with it. I read reviews until my eyes crossed trying to pick one. I highly recommend. I should note I have mid thoracic scoliosis and well as herniated discs in my upper lumbar region so to find a mattress that allows me to wake up actually feeling refreshed at this price point has been nothing short of a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy bumpy memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. I have given it three weeks to sleep on. It's firm. Very firm and I think this let's you feel the imperfections of memory foam. You can feel every bump when you lay down. Don't bother moving through the bed, you will just feel the other lumps. Poor quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Vibing!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one last year for when my parents came to visit. My dad enjoyed it so much, and slept so well, he talked about getting it for his home. Unfortunately he's one of those, why but another when I have a perfectly good bed at home types. Well, I am not that type, sometimes. I ordered it for him and it came today. He thought it was his storage containers he ordered, but was over the moon to see it was a Vibe 12in mattress! He is setting it up right now, documenting with pictures, i sent new bedding also. My dad is 80 and loving his Vibe!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase ever again.
customer_reviews.text: I have literally not had a good nights rest since I purchased this mattress in December. Easily become overheated. So soft it sinks into the middle for both me and my husband. We wish we wouldn't have thrown out our old mattress. Will be getting rid of this as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: B O.

customer_reviews.title: I wish it would have extended
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this bed!!! My bed did not extend to 12in. It only went to 9-9.5in which make it a little low for my liking.. I really don’t want to have to return it but they also haven’t answered my email. It’s a little hard but I think it’s because it’s not puffed it.. i waited 3 days and even slept on my couch so it would extend.. its now been a week and still the same.. really sad.. Amazon said I could return it and ups would pick it up.. but I haven’t decided
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Heaven delivered for under $300
customer_reviews.text: Folks...if you hate your old mattress and looking to get a new one but we're afraid to pay $800 or more for one...have I got a mattress for you. I'm not a salesman, I'm a customer. I just bought this mattress after doing weeks of research with the type of sleeper I am. I have back issues and arthritis in my lower spine, which prevents me from lying on my back a long time. I'm also tall and heavy. After I unpacked this mattress and let it fill up, I laid down in my back for 15 minutes and almost fell asleep. This is heaven for under $300. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mikdee

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some review's i had to admit we were excited! Having spent closer to 2000 for our last bed though we were skeptical still. However there was no reason to be so. Weve had the bed for 4 month's now and love it! Its super comfortable and still firm!
customer_reviews.author: christina wise

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO FIRM
customer_reviews.text: Way too firm. Contemplating returning it. The description says plusher than a regular firm mattress. It actually feels stiffer than any firm mattress I’ve felt. I don’t understand how it is rated almost 5 stars?? There are tons of people saying it’s way too hard. Should have read more into the lower reviews that seem to be hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Turner

customer_reviews.title: It's a mattress and I sleep on it--
customer_reviews.text: This is ok so far. Much, much softer than I was hoping for. Sitting on the edge of it reading and meditating, I've a feeling it's gonna have a squashed flare spot pretty soon! Also, when the box arrived it was ripped halfway open, including the plastic around the mattress, with TIRE MARKS on it! Even on the mattress. My roommate said it looked like it got run over! I'll bet a Hi-Lo driver in some warehouse did it. Funny because I read a couple of other reviews that state they received a ripped open box also. Oh well, returning it would've been a female dog, so I'll keep it .
customer_reviews.author: Mass Retaliation Blog

customer_reviews.title: Rightly nightly
customer_reviews.text: Best sleep I've had in years. I like the way the mattress conforms but doesn't hug or grab. It's surprisingly cool. Price is unreal the $3000.00 mattress I replaced with this felt like sleeping on a rotted barn floor covered in acorn filled burlap sacks in comparison. I've been warned these wear out earlier than traditional mattresses, if so I can buy 13 of these over the years and get sleep for the same amount of money and toss and turn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 12" as listed!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a 12" mattress but it barely expanded to 10.5 after resting open and un used for 4 days. It expanded to that height within the first four hours but never exceeded that. Some areas measure less than 10". Now the quality is great, very much a medium firm mattress if not more firm. Which takes getting used to but we planned on that. The benefit is the support and pain relief a firm mattress offers and that's apparent already. Just wish it was the height listed and as I purchased. May source another mattress from another company and hopefully it works better
customer_reviews.author: matthew levesque

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, Too Hard
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress in queen size for two weeks. Here’s what I can tell you. Cons: ~NOT 12” high as advertised. It’s anywhere from 9” to 10.5” depending on where you measure. The corners are much lower than the middle. ~NOT “medium plush” as advertised. More like firm to very firm. I have an Olee medium firm mattress that’s softer than this one. ~Too hard for side sleeping ~The description says a queen weighs 80 lbs but the box says 65.8. Generally, heavier means better quality memory foam. Pros: ~very little motion transfer ~it doesn’t cave in when u sit on the edge ~no smell ~fast delivery Seriously considering going through the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kwisatz Haderach

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE. DONT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the worst thing I've ever bought, not comfortable at all, I sleep like crap every night. My old spring mattress was heaven compared to this.
customer_reviews.author: Maddi

customer_reviews.title: Stop shopping! You’ve found your new mattress!
customer_reviews.text: First impressions were amazing, I had drove home from work to unpack the mattress and let it rise. I returned home to a fully risen mattress! I jumped in the shower and then threw myself into the mattress. Amazing! And that was just flat on the floor. I got the bed all ready (surprise for my girlfriend) and she came in, sat down and said “whoa! What the hell! This is awesome!” Laying here I fell asleep watching TV... at 6pm! I may have to take the morning off tomorrow! You will not be sorry for giving this mattress a try, you’ll be sorry you didn’t!
customer_reviews.author: Rlbrignac

customer_reviews.title: Too firm, gives me back pain
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress for almost two months now. The entire time I’ve woken up with back pain! This mattress is very firm. I’ve had a memory foam mattress before and it was much softer. I’m 5’3” 180 lbs... you’d think I’m heavy enough to “sink in”. Nope. My back pain seems to be worsening the longer I sleep on this bed... to be able to actually return this mattress, you have to package it.... how the heck do you do that?? Amazon offered me a $111 credit which I accepted... will probably try to find a topper for the bed or just sell it online... don’t recommend if you prefer a softer bed.
customer_reviews.author: tazvang

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper and for a while I would wake up with should, hip and back pain. I finally had to replace my mattress and for a fraction of the cost of my old mattress it has done wonders! I have been on it for a week and for the week I have been pain free. The mattress came as described and was super easy to load onto the bed frame. The bed sleeps a little firm but once you’re on it for a little bit the bed molds to your position.
customer_reviews.author: Mmmaria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress for soft mattress lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy set up! My husband and I love soft mattresses and this is amazing! I love the feeling of a mattress giving you a hug almost. That being said if you like a firmer mattress this probably isn’t for you. Good for heavier people too. My husband is 6’2 and 350+ lbs. No more sre back when I get up in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Bre Kirch

customer_reviews.title: Mattress does not hold up well
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a king mattress in November 2019. It is May 2020 and the mattress has lost its firmness. We purchased a metal box spring to see if it would help with the sagging in the middle. It didn't. We ended purchasing another mattress from Costco as we were experiencing shoulder and neck pain due to the uneven sleep surface. This is a nice mattress, but does not hold up well after just 6 months of use. It is too late to get our money back, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: RBK

customer_reviews.title: Love My New King!
customer_reviews.text: I had a queen he l mattress prior with a different vendor, but needed to upgrade to a king size. I was nervous to switch vendors, But I read all the reviews and did my research and I couldn't be happier with my decision to purchase a Vibe gel mattress. I am a predominant side sleeper and I do have back issues. So, needless to say, choosing the right mattress is everything! It is not too firm and it's not too soft. It is just right, as Goldilocks would say. It is not only great quality, but the price point is the icing on the cake. Highly recommend! 5 Stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: ShanCali

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait!!  Don’t question
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mattress!! It was delivered timely- the box was NOT beat up- my wife and I easily moved it upstairs after removing from the box- the first layer of plastic came right off enabling us to place it on the bed frame- then we removed the second layer of plastic and POOF!! Instant QUALITY mattress!! I am not a spoof review- feel free to email me directly @ makethecutllc@gmail.com - I don’t know how long it will hold up but so far it is better than the $3K temperpedic I bought years ago!! 💗
customer_reviews.author: A+ Student

customer_reviews.title: Bad after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: update: I have owned this bed for 2 months now and it’s now absolutely horrible. We sink down into it and have severe lower back pain when we wake up. The first month was great. I contacted the company and took pictures of the dips, they replaced it free of charge. The new one does the exact same thing. You constantly gave to roll from side to side every hour or so. Spend another $100-$200 and get a better mattress. Do not buy if you have back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple months to write the review to see if the mattress would hold up. I unboxed this the day it came. We had planned to camp out thinking the mattress would take awhile to expand. After 4 hours it was already full size. The memory foam smell was not as overpowering as other mattresses we've tried, so we slept on it that night. I would sincerely describe this as more firm than others I've slept on. Very supportive. We have 2 adults, about 140 lbs and 220 lbs. The bed still looks brand new. We put it into an old waterbed frame and it completely feels it out, true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Manndi

customer_reviews.title: terrible!
customer_reviews.text: total waist of my money. my back hurts worse now then before. the bed slides to one side. hard to move around on the bed. this matress is a joke! i would send back if i could figure out how to get it in a box plus we already threw away our old mattress so we wouldnt have anything to sleep on. the sheets wont stay on. i could go on and on..just so very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: tammiestarr

customer_reviews.title: It’s not what I expected at all! 💚 love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s not what I expected at all! I’ve read the reviews and got some good and some bad. Well there was absolutely no smell of any kind! It filled out fully within minutes of unwrapping. As far as the plush/firm it’s perfect. I’ll give an update a couple of months from now. But for the money I feel so good about taking a leap of faith!!!! I’m a girl and sleep alone I’m 5’4 and 180 I bought the Queen. It’s firm enough I don’t sink in the bed but soft enough that it’s so comfortable! I’ve slept in it a couple of nights and it’s great. I’ll update in a couple of months. Wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Wecker

customer_reviews.title: Thick and firm
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is exactly how thick it is advertised. It's got a nice firmness to it that cradles your body at the same time. I've never felt so comfortable laying on my side than on this mattress. The foam is very sturdy. Nothing about this mattress feels cheap. I purchased the twin. I recommend this to anyone who is trying to buy an affordable mattress. This product does not disappoint. I am so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lac3r

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: My partner has severe neck and back issues and sleeping can be a literal nightmare for him. THIS BED IS THE FIRST ONE HE CAN ACTUALLY GET SOME REST ON. I am truly amazing as the remarkable technology that you have utilized to make this mattress. We LOVE IT! I can't rave enough about it. Recommend it? You bet I do!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: City Girl

customer_reviews.title: misleading reviews
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is ok. Sags in the middle where I sleep. But after reading so many mattress reviews, it seems like they all do that!! It's kind of discouraging. If someone knows of a mattress that doesn't sag, please reply! But what I'm really concerned about are the "reviews" that are listed. If you look at the reviews for this product, and those for asin: B07W2RPPBS, they are exactly the same! Same rating, same reviews, everything. I guess this could be just a simple mistake. Or it could be totally false and deceptive advertising. Hey Amazon/Vibe, can you fix this?
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: This mattress sinks in at the head of the bed, when I’m asleep my feet are higher than my head,I end up sleeping at the foot of the bed to balance it out throughout the night,I am not pleased with my purchase,I’ve tried turning the Mattress around,it helped for a few hours but then went back to sinking in at the head of the bed
customer_reviews.author: staci johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it! No more back pain! VALUE$! Changed my sleeping position!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for the price! No more aches and pains in my back & shoulders.. I actually have become a back sleeper more bc of the supportive comfort! I was a side sleeper forever! I had a Serta before, and really developed hip pain, but sleeping on my back was more even uncomfortable. Nowsleep is forever changed with the "bed in a box". Upon arriving it puffed up quickly and slept on it the same night it came out of the box. The only con, which I think is inevitable for all mattresses is that the side I sleep on is *slightly* worn Down, but since I can rotate & shift the bed around it's not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rwynne

customer_reviews.title: To firm and hurts my back
customer_reviews.text: I was super exited about getting this bed. When it arrived it looked so nice. I waited to let it finish getting to full form before laying on it. I was expecting a soft co.fortable bed. This is just the opposite! It's to firm! Way to firm! My back kills me while sleeping in it! If I could afford to return it and get something else I would! I am still waiting on the mattress protector that was suposed to come with it! If ypur looking for a comfortable bed with great sleep quality and pain relief this is NOT the bed you want
customer_reviews.author: Charlette Noble

customer_reviews.title: Only purchase this mattress if you enjoy feeling miserable.
customer_reviews.text: My home currently has two 'big brand' memory foam mattresses. I've been a staunch fanboy for these types of mattresses since they have become cost efficient. I bought this Vibe mattress hoping it would be a good replacement for the last inner-spring mattress in the house. I've given it time and tried to get used to it. Unfortunately, I absolutely detest it. The mattress ranges from "Extremely firm" to "Am I sleeping on the floor?". It feels more like closed cell automotive foam covered by a low end Walmart memory foam mattress topper.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne K.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We were skeptical about buying a mattress online from amazon especially at this cheap price, but so far it has actually worked very well. I think it took some getting used to at first, but we actually enjoy it very much now. It’s not perfect and I’m sure there are better ones out there, but it’s great if you are looking for a comfortable and cheap mattress. My husband and I are both in our 20s so right now this mattress will do, but I’m sure when we start getting some aches and pains we will need to spend a bit more on a better quality one. Overall, I still think it’s a great deal for a great mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Best $200 Bed-in-a-Box
customer_reviews.text: We only paid $200 for this mattress in Queen size. It came out of the box and puffed up to its full shape very quickly (although they recommend you don’t lay on it for three days). I’d say it’s a little firm (compared to our overpriced $5000 Tempurpedic), but it’s still super comfortable. It appears very durable, although it’s too soon to know. Highly recommended for a guest bed that may not get constant use for 10 years. Then again, it would be great for any bed when considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jarosz

customer_reviews.title: If you're in a warm climate, it sleeps hot
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is advertised as having cooling foam. That has not been our experience. We live in a subtropical climate and right now it is summer. The mattress sleeps hot. I'm not normally warm at night but I have never been so sweaty. We do have a mattress pad on top, but on previous mattresses we used the same mattress pad and the temperature was never an issue. Otherwise, we've noticed that we do not wake up with limbs asleep, as we used to on our old mattress. It's firm, but not uncomfortable. We think it will soften a bit over time.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!! BEDBUGS
customer_reviews.text: Today I received the foam mattress in a box and the delivery came in just on time and the person who delivered it was very respectful and helpful! Today was an exciting day because I had finally ordered my foam mattress 2 days ago and I finally got! it The moment I open this foam mattress and it starts inflating I NOTICED A BEDBUG!!!!!. I had to immediately throw the foam mattress away because WHO knows what MORE BEDBUGS! are there in the mattress! I'm extremely disgusted and I want my refund back!!!I REPEAT DO NOT BUY THIS!! it is not worth your money!!! This is completely unacceptable!!!!!!! I'm extremely disappointed I don't understand how this has a 5 starr???
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but febreeze it
customer_reviews.text: I suggest giving this mattress a few days to adjust to it’s correct level of comfort. The first night my bed was quite hard but after a few days it felt really comfy. My only complaint is the smell. This mattress gives off a dirt/weird smell. I had to febreeze it to death in order to get the odor out. If it weren’t for the fact that I had already tossed my original mattress and carried everything to and from the second floor I would’ve returned this mattress based off the bad smell
customer_reviews.author: Christy G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect firm bed
customer_reviews.text: I held off for awhile ordering a new mattress because I didn't really want to order one online - but with stores currently closed due to COVID I figured I'd go ahead and order one on Amazon. The mattress I had was really soft and hurting my back, I had not been sleeping well. This mattress is perfect! It is firm, but not too hard for me. I have been sleeping so well since I got this mattress. It took about 20 hours to fully fluff up after being in the vacuum sealed bag. I'm so happy that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sgstone

customer_reviews.title: Worth twice the price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Plush but supportive. Does not get hot. I am 135lb, hot sleeper, prior back injury. Had a Purple 2 hybrid mattress prior that I could not get comfortable or good sleep on. This mattress, after a couple nights of adjusting, fixed everything. It’s been 3 months now and still my favorite. Get bamboo sheets too and you’ll be the happiest.
customer_reviews.author: E C

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t conform to body curves, very firm for side sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I gave this bed only 3 stars. I’m over 6’ tall and a muscular 225#, while sleeping on my side my body becomes numb, the foam seems too firm, which is common for me with other mattresses. That’s why I purchased a foam mattress . It’s much more comfortable if I sleep on this mattress on my back. When I sit on the side of the bed it’s very saggy. Considering the low cost of the mattress, it’s not too bad, but there are probably better options out there that are better for the same price. Had I been able to try before buying, I would NOT have purchased. Sometimes you get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cool and a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have read enough reviews to know not every person likes what they buy, however I am happy to admit I really like this mattress. I had purchased one of the classic brand mattress that was 200.00 dollars more than the vibe. I contacted Amazon and they were amazing in helping me with the return of the more expensive one. I am a 6'1" 250lb guy and I am enjoying it immensely!
customer_reviews.author: glen rogers

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I had read a lot of reviews before I purchased and hoped that it would be OK. I saw some strange things said in some of the reviews of many of these memory foam mattresses. I purchased it for my mother to put in my guest bedroom. Mom is very picky. She loved it. She was shocked when I told her what I paid for it. I am too. I mean I had ZERO problems. No strange smell. No time at all to go to full size. Fit perfectly on the bed. Even has some nice logos on it, it looks like quality. My mom used it for two weeks and it is wonderful. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Brakke

customer_reviews.title: Very Deceptive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 12 inches and got a 10 inches mattress. I left it for 72 hours thinking that it would eventually rise to 12 inches but it didn't. I am returning it. This is deceptive. I tried to execute a return and they would have me to do the impossible, i.e. to get this item into the original box. There is no way I would be able to roll this and get back into the box. Also, don't bother to try and call the warranty number listed on the receipt. They are a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy

customer_reviews.title: I would have given 10 stars but it’s not allowed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is turning out to be amazing. I was a little sketchy due to the fact the bed arrived in a damaged box. Which allowed spiders and other bugs to enter the box and I hate spiders. That is just where it was probably stored BUT again I hate spiders. The bed says to let air 24 to 48 hours before adding bedding. LIES it took all of 2 hours for it to puff up to its full 12 inches. I slept on the bed that night and my family had a hard time getting up this morning because it is so freaking comfortable and the right amount of firmness and softness. I would def stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Channel Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so less then 300$ for king size bed, seems too good to be true, but it’s NOT!! Took a little over 24 hours to be fully puffed up and then it was perfect, soft and firm. I like a little more firm hubby likes it soft and this was perfect for both of us. Only down side is it had a bit of a chemical smell the first day while puffing up, but by the next night when we went to sleep on it, it was gone. I would highly recommend this! I read a bunch of reviews and checked in stores and this just takes the cake for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My first bed in a bag and it’s awesome! Bought it 3rd quarter 2017 and have no regrets. I sleep better than before! People love to sleep on my bed because it’s so comfy. Affordable and comfortable, I would buy again. It’s not a firm mattress but it’s not soft either. My family loves firm mattresses only but really liked this one! Delivery was easy and stress free and setup was a breeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very firm mattress.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this mattress with the caveat that we use a softer memory foam mattress topper. It was too firm for us without one. It did seem to regulate temperature pretty well, though. If you like really firm mattresses or sleep on your back, this is the one for you. We let it air up for several days before using it (but it was fully inflated in an hour) and didn’t notice much of smell. Happy with it, overall.
customer_reviews.author: Momorama

customer_reviews.title: Sleep sound and awake rested.
customer_reviews.text: If I didnt get hot spots from where I laid it would be 5 stars across the board. This is by far the most unnoticeable mattress. By that I mean once I pass out there is no pressure on my body what so ever. I replaced my boxspring and mattress with this 12 inch foam mattress and all my sheets fit. I suffre from Osteoarthritis in my right hip, DDD and herniated discs. Not once have I awoken due to pain caused from sleeping on my sides. My 2 other beds I tried may have been comfy but I awoke to extreme sore spots. THIS is a winner for people with hip,back pain or restless legs. 5 STARS
customer_reviews.author: YungDebtCollector

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love the mattress I just wish it were just a little bit more firm, easy to enroll and unpack and expanded in a matter of moments. I didn’t have any odor like some people said and I was ready to sleep on the next day really I could’ve slept on at the same day but I gave it a moment. My only issue was when you sit on it on the edge it just squishes down so much but I’ve slept very well since I got it it was a good purchase well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not hot, no chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when my grandchildren sleepover. They are still little, so I bunk with them. This is very comfortable. I was worried about smell, and it being too hot,but that isn’t an issue. This is so dense, you don’t feel the other person move. The box was trashed when it arrived, but the mattress was safely enclosed in heavy plastic. I was able to get it upstairs myself, but I wouldn’t want to do that again! We have only used it a handful of times in a month, but I love it so far...
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: ❌👎🏼!!️
customer_reviews.text: I've slept on this bed since March. Started out good but I couldn't roll over on mattress without picking up my whole body to move. Became challenging to get up and out of the mattress I mean I literally feel as if I am trying to crawl out of mud to get out of this bed. Now I'm so sore when I wake up I can't move! Painful 😖 my arms, hips, knees, even hands HURT!! You cannot sit upright on this bed the only position you can do is lay down and when you lay down you can't get up.. Ordered a new bed I can't take this anymore 🙁👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Drum Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Medium Firm !
customer_reviews.text: It is on the firmer side, for sure. The mattress itself is very soft - but the support is more medium-firm. I have chronic pain and my spine is overly curved. I have insomnia - I have my whole life. I fall asleep on this bed, almost instantly. It’s just the right amount of support while still being lush. My partner prefers a soft bed, where I prefer more firm ~ it’s a great mixture of both. It expanded all the way. Would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: It just FEELS GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: First, great price. Second, fast delivery Mattress was at full thickness within 2 hours. Nice quality cover. I'd call it Medium-Firm. It's a mattress that you literally just want to lay on because it feels so good. After a week I'm really loving it. I'd call it temperature neutral. Certainly wake up with less pain in the shoulders and neck. One small flaw... not enough to deduct a star... through the cover you can feel that the blocks of foam that were cut to make the mattress, the edges are rough and chunky instead of neatly sliced. Can you see it through the mattress cover? No. But you can feel it if you examine it from the side.
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: FIRM, but so amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: FIRM MATTRESS, but the best one I've ever slept on. September 2019 I purchased a BEAR mattress for over $1,000 for my room and my goodness do I regret it.. I bought this for my 3 year old daughter. Inexpensive, good reviews-sold! I have not slept in my own bed since. This bed is unbelievable! Perfectly firm and so comfortable. Exactly what my back needed. I've never slept better. I need to buy a king for myself but ugh I just spent so much on my BEAR!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Our mattress came very quickly. It unboxed easily, inflated quicker than expected. I was a little nervous after some of the reviews that I read I'm here. But our mattress had no smell, it's inflated itself to the full 12in. It does dip in after you've been laying on it for a while, but I expected that with a memory foam. I am a very warm sleeper, so it does get a little bit warm, but nothing overwhelming. I would highly recommend this, especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Bed awesome !!!shipping is a joke !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed !!!! I have another one already for both my boys !!! It’s great .. but the shipping was a joke ! 2 days was 3 weeks and the package moved around all over by me for weeks never making it to my house !!!!!!!!!! If they said 3 weeks in the first place that would be fine but saying 2 days and taking 3 weeks is annoying ! My son had to sleep on the couch waiting !!!!! So epic fail on shipping
customer_reviews.author: Coral see

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Personally the mattress is good not great. My girlfriend finds it too soft and that the mattress gets warm. Both of these things are true, but in my opinion not necessarily negatives. I also have found that the foam gets weak after being compressed and definitely loses what firmness it may have after an hour or so. I have had this mattress for a few months and would say its quality has held up. Nothing has surprised me about this purchase and would definitely consider buying a Vibe Mattress again at the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping better than a baby
customer_reviews.text: I keep the mattreses in the storage for 5 weeks because our house wasn't ready to move in on time. When I opened ..... BAM ! In maybe 20 minutes - nice 12" mattreses ! For the price, you can't beat comfort and good night sleep without backpain in the morning. I been sleeping on it for 2 weeks night and is very hard to get of the bed in the morning. And my 16 years old son agree........
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Tomecek

customer_reviews.title: too soft, no support
customer_reviews.text: this shouldnt be described as medium; it is soft. i cannot sleep in it without it causing lower back pain. it seamed ok for the first few nights; then it gets softer and it provides NO back support. I had my son and brother try it when staying over and they wound up more comfortable sleeping on the floor. this may be a decents KIDS mattress for someone under 100lbs; but not for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Jalang63

customer_reviews.title: Hot and way too firm
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's a pretty good mattress, but absolutely not what I expected. There is no give; it is HARD imo. Not cozy at all. We had to get out our old 3" topper to make it sleepable for me. First night on it I woke up soaked with sweat, so it really holds some heat! Regardless, it's better than our old crappy innerspring mattress. Just be aware that it is super firm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STIFF!
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months of using this bed, it is VERY stiff - we wake up sore every single morning. .. so before you think it is a good deal (which it is) just think of your comfort level and how much a good night sleep means to you..
customer_reviews.author: MommyBee

customer_reviews.title: Great bargin mattress
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I purchased a Leesa mattress several years ago and spent $900, don't get me wrong the mattress is very comfortable and glad I bought one. This Vibe mattress that cost me $269 is pretty much an imposter of the more expensive other brand name ones out there. This mattress is the same gel memory foam and even feels like the Leesa mattress at half the cost. Bought this for my teen daughter and she said she slept great! Very comfortable for her. Only thing I noticed is it is not 12 inch, only rised to 10 inch but that is fine. Very happy with this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: kpratz

customer_reviews.title: WOW! I was a little skeptical but WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This was the EASIEST mattress purchase EVER! They delivered promptly (no delivery fee via Prime) and my Son lugged it upstairs and I carefully removed packaging to a hissing of air filling the mattress and within hours it was perfect! I did place it on the dust ruffle and bed frame before opening. Didn't know how heavy it would be later. But it looks and feels great! So happy I took the chance. Can't wait to need another!!
customer_reviews.author: Denese

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This is like sleeping on a marshmallow. You sink into it, the center becomes a bowl that you can barely crawl out of, and it's murder on your joints. (I'm saying this as someone who's merely 35 years old and loves to curl up and sleep on a beanbag.) Forget sleeping on your back or stomach. My boyfriend and I end up smashed together and sunk into the middle, sweating against the dense, gripping memory foam. We're not even obese.
customer_reviews.author: VSchulke

customer_reviews.title: Could have spent over $1,000 for a mattress of this quality - so glad we didn’t have to!
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive king size mattress, I recommend this one. Have been sleeping on it since the day it arrived, and still have no complaints. We’d had a $2,500 Sect Comfort king size mattress that really worked well... but only for about 4 yrs. now we’ve got this one, having paid less than $300, and find it to be the slightly better of the two. This is a 12 inch mattress, so at last, we have a mattress that fits with today’s sheets with the “deep pocket” corners on them. With this mattress, at last our sheets fit like they should. The mattress is moderately firm. Not too soft and not too firm. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: So far, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I've had this mattress for 1.5 years and it is still in perfect shape. Over 6 months ago, my girlfriend moved in, and although she's a lot smaller than I am, it hasn't effected the quality of comfort of the mattress. This mattress is more than worth it. I’ve had this bed for three months. I’m 6 feet tall and weigh 220 pounds. I sleep in the same spot of the bed every night and it’s by far the most comfortable bed I’ve ever owned. Perfect mixture of plush and firmness and I sleep like a baby on it. I’ll update this if my opinion changes, but for a little over 300, you can’t beat it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: This is a good mattress
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new mattress and needed one in our low budget. This purchase quite exceeded my expectations. It's very comfortable for me and my husband. He sleeps hot and I sleep frigidly cold. We both feel comfortable on this mattress. It's amazing the difference between our older mattress we spent thousands on and this that I spent hundreds on. We are very pleased. Thank you to the company that has brought us good dreams without making us poor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: NOT Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was comfortable for about a month then started sagging in the middle making it to where my wife and I roll to the center. Now we both have trouble getting comfortable and wake up hurting and not rested. Tried to add some type support under the mattress but it still sagged in the center. Our daughter had purchased this same mattress and they had the same problem. DO NOT RECOMEND this mattress!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon1

customer_reviews.title: If the cover doesn’t fit snug the quality of rest will be poor
customer_reviews.text: The cover on this mattress is very loose. It’s wrinkled and uncomfortable because it wrinkles up under our backside. It has a few tiny black spots that leave me wondering what they are. I purchased one before this and it is perfect I don’t know what went wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Prater

customer_reviews.title: Not memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Mattress's quality was very good so I do not know what people are complaining about. This is not gel-infused memory foam and it is a medium-firm mattress with a soft foam topper. If you are the same as us and expecting a plush mattress this is not it. We are going to try to add a true gel-infused memory foam topper and see if that works before returning. For the price and return policy, I do not think you can't go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great Value But Very Firm
customer_reviews.text: This mattress shipped very fast and was delivered well packed without damage. It opened up very well to full capacity within a few hours. I was excited to try it the first night but woke up the next day pretty sore due to the mattress firmness. It is very firm but I’ll give it some more time and consider 5 stars later if I get used to it. It seems well made but just can’t believe how firm it is.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a box, no odor upon opening. Expands to almost 12" and is an awesome, comfortable mattress. I'm 6'3", 230, and it supports my "shape" for a comfortable sleep. No rolling over to avoid painful pressure points from a stiffer mattress. And the cost, I paid $268.00. My sister paid hundreds more, I mean way more, for her foam mattress. Mine was a king, so I opened in the bedroom, there was no trying to carry this thing up the stairway. So far, love this mattress. (don't tell my sister)
customer_reviews.author: tool user

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about ordering a mattress online! But our mattress was horrible and during quarantine time we couldn't go to a store to try any out. So we decided to try a bed in a box. When it first arrived we didn't think we made the right choice. But after taking it out of the shrink wrap, it started springing into shape almost instantly. I saw a few complaints about smell but we didn't notice anything more than just a new smell. Within 2 hrs it was to its full size. I've noticed while sleeping now my hips do not have as much pain. We've had this mattress for about 2 weeks now and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N.

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress, but quality changed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Vibe a week ago, in a queen size at $100 with tax more than it’s currently selling. I have the same mattress in a king size. Which we bought a year ago. Because, we love our mattress, we bought the queen for our guest room. It’s been on the bed for 4 days. It’s comfortable like the other. But, the sides and foot side areas, sink in when you sit. Mine does not sink in those areas. I am not as happy with this one. The price kept changing. I am upset that I paid $100 more. My king one was the same price as this one. The quality of the materials must have changed.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Best bed purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I've owned and slept on traditional mattress/box spring, waterbed, and Sleep Number beds, so I feel I have a diverse basis for comparison. After sleeping on the Vibe for a month now, I am happy to report that it is every bit as comfortable as any bed I have owned. Compared to the thousands of dollars I've spent on previous beds, this mattress is a real winner. I'll try to remember to post an update after more time has passed so I can report on durability, but for the price, I can afford to replace it every couple of years (not that I expect to need to) and still come out way ahead of what I've spent in the past.
customer_reviews.author: mac40k

product_meta.title: Vibe 12-Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress | Bed in a Box, [Mattress Only], Queen
product_meta.description:
Size:Queen| Style:Memory Foam Mattress OnlyGood mornings, good feelings, good times, good Vibe. 

The Vibe 12-inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress combines two leading sleep technologies at an incredible value. Gel-infused memory foam keeps you cool during sleep and body-contouring memory foam reduces pressure points and properly aligns the spine. Gel draws heat away from the body and creates a cooler sleep surface and aids in preventing excessive tossing and turning so you can get a more restful night's sleep. The feel of this gel memory foam mattress is slightly plusher than a traditional firm mattress. 

Why Choose Vibe

The Vibe mattress is comprised of gel memory foam which supports every part of the body evenly and individually. Gel Memory foam automatically adjusts to your body’s weight and temperature. In addition to the slow, conforming response, Vibe offers complete, luxurious, and stress-free support. This can reduce pressure points and allow the spine to stay properly aligned in a neutral position. When you move in bed, memory foam gently 'fills in' and reshapes itself to your new sleeping posture and minimizes motion disturbance and transfers between partners. 

Benefits of Gel Memory Foam

The latest technology in gel memory foam mattress, this mattress is conforming, comfortable, and comes complete. A combination of 2 inches of gel memory foam with 3 inches of gel comfort foam provides the ultimate in breathability and heat displacement while 7 inches of high-density base foam beneath offers maximum support, pressure point relief, and proper spinal alignment. All this surrounded by a luxurious stretch knit cover, you may never want to leave your bed. 

Low-Cost Quality Solution for Good Sleep

The Vibe Mattress is a low-cost solution to more expensive branded memory foam beds and is a smart alternative without sacrificing quality, comfort, or support. 

Get it Right the First Time

It is also a good idea to know the size and the height of your mattress ahead of time to make sure you are ordering the correct size. Keep in mind that you should combine the height of your bed frame, foundation, or adjustable bed base with the height of your mattress to get a gauge of the how tall your sleep system will be. 

Twin Size - 39" W x 75" L x 12" H
Twin XL Size - 39" W x 80" L x 12" H
Full Size - 54" W x 75" L x 12" H
Queen Size – 60" W x 80" L x 12" H
King Size – 76" W x 80" L x 12" H
California King Size – 72" W x 84" L x 12" H 

A Good Vibe Shipped to your Door 

The Vibe Mattress ships compressed and roll-packed conveniently to your home. Set-up is easy, and you can sleep on it the same night. Vibe also uses Smart Packaging. Smart packaging reduces the carbon footprint in the manufacturers shipping process. Our advanced packaging technology means we can roll-pack our mattresses and ship them at one-third of the normal size. As a result of this process, we can ship more mattresses per delivery and reduce the amount of carbon emissions. A mattress that is roll-packed still retains its initial quality, as each will quickly recover and return to its original shape after being removed from its packaging. 

Buy With Confidence

The Vibe mattress s backed up by a 10-Year Manufacturer's Limited and is made using premium materials and skilled craftsmanship.
feature_bullets: 2 inches of gel-infused memory foam combined 3 inches of gel-infused foam draws heat away from your body for a more comfortable night's sleep
7 inches of conforming high-density base foam provides surrounding support and responsive relief that helps evenly distribute pressure points in any sleeping position
Luxurious stretch knit quilted fiber cover
Medium-plush feel and adjustable base friendly

High-quality memory foam conforms to your body while the cool gel regulates temperature; memory foam is naturally hypoallergenic and resistant to allergens, mold, bacteria, and dust mites and meets CertiPUR-US program standards for performance, emissions, and durability
Mattress ships compressed, rolled and shipped in a box conveniently delivered to your door for easy set-up; frame/foundation/base not included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars9,497 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Vibe 12-Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Queen
